1555665471_1BXdtJD8d5s813aPwKoxEjGWPaNGB.body: Cause torrents work very well. That system is already established and has stood the test of time. With a little prior research torrents are very easy to use. Plus there's the anonymity factor, which is solved with VPNs. As far as I'm aware IPFS doesn't protect anonymity, at least not yet so you would need to use one anyway. I2P is probably the best for anonymity, but torrents are still very slow on there.
